title: Razer launches new streaming gear including an audio mixer and key light
content:
Razer has announced a handful of new products geared towards professional streamers and content creators. The three new products include the Razer Seiren Bluetooth microphone, the Razer Key Light Chroma, and the Razer Audio Mixer.
